rows.label: tlk70000003_02_msg0001
rows.name: Those hats we made now become big hit!

rows.label: tlk70000003_02_msg0002
rows.name:
So glad town's littlepon now
wearing them. So happy!

rows.label: tlk70000003_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Dekudeku acted full of it
then, but truth be known,
Dekudeku was bit anxious!

rows.label: tlk70000003_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But with help from friends and shop
owner, managed to ease worries!

rows.label: tlk70000003_02_msg0005
rows.name: Much fun for Dekudeku! Thank you!
